items.title: Smart Motion
items.desc: Dual-motor electric lift. Smooth, silent 38mm/s travel. 4 memory presets on LED touch interface. Anti-collision tech included.

items.title: Zero Clutter
items.desc: Integrated power routing via central spine. Hidden cable tray with brush grommets. Clean desk, clear mind.

items.title: Snap & Go
items.desc: Click-lock frame connections. Just 6 screws for the top. Full setup perfectly in under 20 minutes.

items.title: Infinite Setup
items.desc: Add monitor arms, acoustic panels, CPU mounts. Everything connects via universal T-slot.

items.title: App Connected
items.desc: Sync with Metro App via Bluetooth. Track standing habits, get wellness nudges, sync presets across the grid.

items.title: Pure Ergonomics
